verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they put out <WH7971> of the camp <WH4264> every leper <WH6879>, and every one that hath an issue <WH2100>, and whosoever is defiled <WH2931> by the dead <WH5315>:

Both male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> shall ye put out <WH7971>, without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> shall ye put <WH7971> them; that they defile <WH2930> not their camps <WH4264>, in the midst <WH8432> whereof <WH834> I dwell <WH7931>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did so <WH6213>, and put them out <WH7971> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>: as the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, When a man <WH376> or woman <WH802> shall commit <WH6213> any sin <WH2403> that men <WH120> commit <WH4603>, to do a trespass <WH4604> against the LORD <WH3068>, and that person <WH5315> be guilty <WH816>;

Then they shall confess <WH3034> their sin <WH2403> which they have done <WH6213>: and he shall recompense <WH7725> his trespass <WH817> with the principal <WH7218> thereof, and add <WH3254> unto it the fifth <WH2549> part thereof, and give <WH5414> it unto him against whom he hath trespassed <WH816>.

But if the man <WH376> have no kinsman <WH1350> to recompense <WH7725> the trespass <WH817> unto, let the trespass <WH817> be recompensed <WH7725> unto the LORD <WH3068>, even to the priest <WH3548>; beside the ram <WH352> of the atonement <WH3725>, whereby an atonement shall be made <WH3722> for him.
And every offering <WH8641> of all the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they bring <WH7126> unto the priest <WH3548>, shall be his.
And every man's <WH376> hallowed things <WH6944> shall be his: whatsoever any man <WH376> giveth <WH5414> the priest <WH3548>, it shall be his.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them, If any <WH376> man's <WH376> wife <WH802> go aside <WH7847>, and commit <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against him,

And a man <WH376> lie <WH7901> with her carnally <WH7902> <WH2233>, and it be hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of her husband <WH376>, and be kept close <WH5641>, and she be defiled <WH2930>, and there be no witness <WH5707> against her, neither she be taken <WH8610> with the manner;

And the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him, and he be jealous <WH7065> of his wife <WH802>, and she be defiled <WH2930>: or if the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him, and he be jealous <WH7065> of his wife <WH802>, and she be not defiled <WH2930>:

Then shall the man <WH376> bring <WH935> his wife <WH802> unto the priest <WH3548>, and he shall bring <WH935> her offering <WH7133> for her, the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of barley <WH8184> meal <WH7058>; he shall pour <WH3332> no oil <WH8081> upon it, nor put <WH5414> frankincense <WH3828> thereon; for it is an offering <WH4503> of jealousy <WH7068>, an offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146>, bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to remembrance <WH2142>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring her near <WH7126>, and set <WH5975> her before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> holy <WH6918> water <WH4325> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>; and of the dust <WH6083> that is in the floor <WH7172> of the tabernacle <WH4908> the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947>, and put <WH5414> it into the water <WH4325>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and uncover <WH6544> the woman's <WH802> head <WH7218>, and put <WH5414> the offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146> in her hands <WH3709>, which is the jealousy <WH7068> offering <WH4503>: and the priest <WH3548> shall have in his hand <WH3027> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall charge her by an oath <WH7650>, and say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, If no man <WH376> have lain <WH7901> with thee, and if thou hast not gone aside <WH7847> to uncleanness <WH2932> with another instead of thy husband <WH376>, be thou free <WH5352> from this bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779>:

But if thou hast gone aside <WH7847> to another instead of thy husband <WH376>, and if thou be defiled <WH2930>, and some man <WH376> have <WH5414> lain <WH7903> with thee beside <WH1107> thine husband <WH376>:

Then the priest <WH3548> shall charge <WH7650> the woman <WH802> with an oath <WH7621> of cursing <WH423>, and the priest <WH3548> shall say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, The LORD <WH3068> make <WH5414> thee a curse <WH423> and an oath <WH7621> among <WH8432> thy people <WH5971>, when the LORD <WH3068> doth make <WH5414> thy thigh <WH3409> to rot <WH5307>, and thy belly <WH990> to swell <WH6639>;

And this water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall go <WH935> into thy bowels <WH4578>, to make thy belly <WH990> to swell <WH6638>, and thy thigh <WH3409> to rot <WH5307>: And the woman <WH802> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>, amen <WH543>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall write <WH3789> these curses <WH423> in a book <WH5612>, and he shall blot <WH4229> them out with the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325>:

And he shall cause the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779>: and the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her, and become bitter <WH4751>.

Then the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the jealousy <WH7068> offering <WH4503> out of the woman's <WH802> hand <WH3027>, and shall wave <WH5130> the offering <WH4503> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and offer <WH7126> it upon the altar <WH4196>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall take an handful <WH7061> of the offering <WH4503>, even the memorial <WH234> thereof, and burn <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196>, and afterward <WH310> shall cause the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>.

And when he hath made her to drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>, then it shall come to pass, that, if she be defiled <WH2930>, and have done <WH4603> trespass <WH4604> against her husband <WH376>, that the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her, and become bitter <WH4751>, and her belly <WH990> shall swell <WH6638>, and her thigh <WH3409> shall rot <WH5307>: and the woman <WH802> shall be a curse <WH423> among <WH7130> her people <WH5971>.
And if the woman <WH802> be not defiled <WH2930>, but be clean <WH2889>; then she shall be free <WH5352>, and shall conceive <WH2232> seed <WH2233>.
This is the law <WH8451> of jealousies <WH7068>, when a wife <WH802> goeth aside <WH7847> to another instead of her husband <WH376>, and is defiled <WH2930>;

Or when the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> cometh <WH5674> upon him <WH376>, and he be jealous <WH7065> over his wife <WH802>, and shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and the priest <WH3548> shall execute <WH6213> upon her all this law <WH8451>.
Then shall the man <WH376> be guiltless <WH5352> from iniquity <WH5771>, and this <WH1931> woman <WH802> shall bear <WH5375> her iniquity <WH5771>.
